b.span: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING
OUTER CARTON – Cartridge. Pack of 5 and 10

title.value: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

p.span: ABASAGLAR 100 units/mL solution for injection in a cartridge
Each mL contains 100 units insulin glargine (equivalent to 3.64 mg).
Excipients: zinc oxide, metacresol, glycerol, hydrochloric acid and sodium hydroxide, water for injections.
These cartridges are for use with a Lilly 3 mL pen only.
Read the package leaflet before use.

b.span: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

title.value: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

p.span: Keep out of the sight and reach of children.
Store in original package in order to protect from light.

p.span: ABASAGLAR 100 units/mL KwikPen solution for injection in a pre-filled pen
Each mL contains 100 units insulin glargine (equivalent to 3.64 mg).
Excipients: zinc oxide, metacresol, glycerol, hydrochloric acid and sodium hydroxide, water for injections.
Read the package leaflet before use.

b.span: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

Recap the pen after use to protect from light.
